centerText.headline: Your donation will help protect the planet!
centerText.text: Greenpeace is trusted by millions of people around the world to care for the environment and help protect our planet for future generations.

mixedContent.headline: Greenpeace goes where others can't
mixedContent.text: Our independent research teams travel to some of the most remote parts of the globe. From the Amazon rainforests to the Arctic wilderness you can trust that Greenpeace will report back on environmental problems and work with local communities and governments to find a solution.

issues.headline: Your donation will have an impact.

issueList.headline: CLIMATE
issueList.text: To save the climate and build a safer, greener fairer world together.

issueList.headline: OCEANS
issueList.text: To protect the source of all life and our best defences against climate change.

issueList.headline: ARCTIC
issueList.text: To protect the Arctic from destructive oil drilling and commercial fishing.

issueList.headline: FORESTS
issueList.text: To take action to stop deforestation, expose illegal logging activities, and protect indigenous rights.

issueList.headline: PLASTICS
issueList.text: To rid the world of plastics and toxics for a healthier world.

issueList.headline: HEALTH
issueList.text: To ensure healthy food for all, and protect the soil, water and the climate.

impacts.headline: Your donation will have an impact.

impactList.tagline: Response to COVID-19 and other disruptive moments
Response to COVID-19 and other disruptive moments

testimonials.headline: By working together your donation will make a difference.
testimonials.text: Read what people say about Greenpeace.

testimonialList.name: Pang Cheung Sze
testimonialList.title: Executive Director of Greenpeace East Asia
testimonialList.quote: We are living in a time of great environmental challenges and what happens here in East Asia will have an immense impact on the future of our planet.

testimonialList.name: Santosh Pai
testimonialList.title: Lawyer and Board Chair of Greenpeace East Asia
testimonialList.quote: The world-changing work of Greenpeace East Asia would not be possible without you. Together we can make the world a better place for us and for the generations to come.

testimonialList.name: Kate
testimonialList.title: Campaigner
testimonialList.quote: I feel glad that I can work with communities, individuals, volunteers, teachers, activists, and many more to help preserve our one and only planet.

testimonialList.name: Dolphin
testimonialList.title: Deckhand on Greenpeace's ships
testimonialList.quote: One of our main duties is to collect samples and data for research, to uncover the truth for our environment. Your generous gift is the strongest back for our mission!

testimonialList.name: Sharon
testimonialList.title: Donor for over 2 years
testimonialList.quote: Being a mum, I know how importance it is to make change for today and our next generation. Everyone has a share in environmental protection.

testimonialList.name: Brian
testimonialList.title: Organiser of a fund-raising campaign
testimonialList.quote: I believe that regardless of age and identity, everyone can promote a greener planet.
